DEMO_109_MSG_010:
̅Hmm, that machine... lets you fuse monsters together? 
I see... that is very intriguing, indeed.
ā
DEMO_109_MSG_020:
̅If it's going to be beneficial to us all, then I shall grant
you permission to activate and use such a device.
ā
DEMO_109_MSG_030:
̅I suppose we should give it a test run... 
What in the world!?
DEMO_109_MSG_040: ̅This is not good at all! What is the cause of this!?
DEMO_109_MSG_050:
́Y-y-your Majesty! I have some grave news, I'm afraid! 
All of that shaking that just occured...
ā
DEMO_109_MSG_060:
́It's thrown your loyal subjects into a frenzy of panic!
What ever shall we do?
DEMO_109_MSG_070: ̅Hmm... until we can pinpoint the source of this shaking, there's not much we'll be able to do about it...
DEMO_109_MSG_080:
́Welp, it's a good thing I'm two steps ahead o' ya'll, already! I think I've figured out what's causin' all the fuss.
ā
DEMO_109_MSG_090:
́There's some machinery up on the top floor that's vibratin', and causin' all that turbulence.
ā
DEMO_109_MSG_100: ́So far as I can tell, it's just gonna keep runnin' too. Looks like we're gonna have to wait on testin' that fusion machine.
DEMO_109_MSG_110: ̅Excellent work, Ace! What do you suppose we should do about this?
DEMO_109_MSG_120:
́I'm thinkin' if we can get those elevators back online... 
I could get up there, an' fix that machine... Except...
ā
DEMO_109_MSG_130:
́I'm gonna need ȁ's help with all those monsters.
What'd ya say pal... Will you help us out again?
DEMO_109_MSG_140:
̅Hmmm, precisely! I shall leave it to both of you then...
Good luck, Ace and ȁ.
DEMO_109_MSG_150: ́Alright, so first I'm gonna need you to use yer reactor an' release the lock that's holdin' up the elevator on the left side of your map.
